summary: This module tests the case-insensitive string comparison functionality (SM_STRNCASEEQ) by reading test cases from stdin and verifying the expected results. It's part of the sendmail test suite for string equality operations.

logs.reason: Displayed when the program is invoked with incorrect command-line arguments to inform the user about proper usage
logs.resolution: Follow the usage instructions and provide valid command-line arguments

logs.resolution: This is an informational message, no resolution required

logs.reason: Identifies the beginning of the test suite for the case-insensitive string comparison functionality
logs.resolution: This is an informational message, no resolution required

logs.reason: Displayed when a test case fails, showing the two strings being compared and the expected vs. actual result values
logs.resolution: Debug the SM_STRNCASEEQ implementation or verify that the test case input is correct
